Home Features Docs FAQ Blog Downloads

Snippets Made Awesome

Gisto is a code snippet manager that runs on GitHub Gists and adds additional features such as searching, tagging and sharing gists while including a rich code editor.

All your data is stored on GitHub and you can access it from GitHub Gists at any time with changes carrying over to Gisto.

Changelog

Features

List of features and new additions

Web client

Full featured web client is now available

Downloads

Mirrors, nightly builds and prev. versions
Tweet

Features

Rich Editor

Gisto includes open-source monaco editor. A rich code editor for editing your Gists and includes features such as syntax highlighting auto-completion emmet and more.

Search

Gists can be found quickly using our search and can be filtered by gist description, file names, tag or multiple tags, language and more.

Tags

Gisto allows you to tag Gists with custom tags to help you find your Gists easily. Just add hashtag to snippet title and you done. Later gitsts can be found by typing hash-tag into search or from the tag list on the dashboard.

More features

About </Gisto>

why

Gisto started by fulfilling a lack of a syntax highlighted and cloud synchronized code snippet solution.

who

Gisto is developed by a team of two web developers on their spare time.

We appreciate any suggestions or contributions to make Gisto better.

how

Gisto is built using the open web technologies using several open source projects such as AngularJS, nw.js, Ace Editor and many more
